name: Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with vibrant colors and thin bezels, ideal for gaming and productivity.

description: Comfortable and stylish casual wear, perfect for everyday use. Made from high-quality cotton.

description: High-performance smartphone with a 6.5-inch display, powerful processor, and excellent camera.
